dc_description_s: The TIGER/Line Shapefiles are an extract of selected geographic and cartographic information from the Census MAF/TIGER database. The Census MAF/TIGER database represents a seamless national file with no overlaps or gaps between parts. However, each TIGER/Line Shapefile is designed to stand alone as an independent data set or the shapefiles can be combined to cover the whole nation.
dc_creator_sm: U.S. Department of Commerce, U.S. Census Bureau, Geography Division
dc_title_s: TIGER/Line Shapefile, 2000 state, Census 2000 State Legislative District (SLD) Lower Chamber: Pennsylvania, 2009
